original_title: Boogie in Blue: Harry "The Hipster" Gibson
overview: U.S. documentary on Harry "The Hipster" Gibson. The wild madman of ad-lib boogie woogie and jazz, Harry Gibson was admired by astonished colleagues such as Cab Calloway, Charlie Parker, Billie Holiday and many others for his over-the-top keyboard style and brilliant, frenetic improvisation. This film preserves his legacy.
title: Boogie in Blue: Harry "The Hipster" Gibson
